greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)=Sum( i^k*tan(k*Pi/(4n)))/(4i) where 1<=k<=4n and (k,n)=1.
comment: This seems to be (-1)^(n+1) times h(-4n^2) = (-1)^(n+1)*A000003(n^2), where h(k) is the class number. Verified for n <= 10^5. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 28 2013
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 28 2003
ext: Definition corrected by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 25 2013
